title: Game-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Job Interview Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic career exploration experience and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A job interview preparation program for elementary teachers, offering a blended learning environment combining AI-based simulations and role-playing.

learning_goals: Learners can respond to three or more types of job-specific interview questions through simulation games.
Learners identify and revise two or more areas for improvement in their responses using an AI feedback system.
Learners demonstrate three or more developmental changes in interview demeanor and communication skills through peer evaluation activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
